messages.message: Hey, do we have plans to change the upload experience in Converse? At the moment if I drag a file to the file panel and its being digitised it locks the file so I cant click on it. It also prevents any new files being uploaded. I’m quite often uploading files from different places and this means I have to wait until each file completes before uploading the next

Interesting! Most of the users have reported using 1-2 sources (folders, drives etc) for their documents so far. I’m curious what causes fragmentation for you, @Lee ? :smiley: We will add it to the backlog
this is something we’re looking into for the enterprise build
